item.description:
"John Stone's Inn was originally built in 1832 and today is well known for its charming, old New England d√©cor, its food, and its spirits--and not necessarily the kind you drink"

It was once a stop on the underground railway, and is now a restaurant, that is haunted by several ghosts.

For more details, and history of the Inn you can go to:

http://www.ghostvilla...

We will be meeting at the Inn, at 5:00 for a meet and greet until 5:30 pm when we will have a short tour, and narration from the manager about the history of the inn, and the types of haunted happenings the people of the inn have experienced. We will then be having a "pay your own dinner", in the "ghost room" which is where most of the haunted activities occur, and then for those who would like to stay after dinner, drinks in the bar.

You can see the dinner menu at: http://stonespublicho...

During dinner we will be having a converstion on tales from the other side with "Share your ghost story"

Directions:

John Stone's Inn
(Now known as Stone's Public House)
179 Main St.
Ashland, Ma 01721
(508) 881 1778


Coming from the North take:

495 South
to Exit 23 ( Take Rte 9 East)
Travel 3 miles on Rte 9 to intersection
with Oak Hill Rd on the right
Turn Right onto Oak Hill Rd
Follow it until it merges with Cordaville Rd.
(merging Left)
Follow this until it joins onto Pleasant St.
Follow Pleasant St to the end which will be
Main St.
Turn Right onto Main St.
And it should be right there at the railroad tracks.

Please take the phone number with you, in case you
get lost, you can call the inn....

also my number is (508) 847- 7677

Also, a few other things...

Please keep track of the total your dinner and drinks, so at the end, you can give Tony the money to pay the bill, which I am sure is going to be HUGE....lol....also, please add a tip to your own total, I am sure for large parties they are going to add the tip to the bill. An easy way I figure out how much my tip is, is to figure

$2 for every $10 spent

So if your bill comes to $20
your tip would be $4

When you get there, ask for the "Meet-up"
and they will tell you where to go.

We are meeting at 5pm-
The tour and talk will begin promptly at 5:30.

I am really, really looking forward to this!

See you there!! :)

Love, Tala
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Meet-Up at the door :)
item.why: Why? Because it is a unique thing to do! :)
item.name: Dinner & Tour at Haunted John Stones Inn
